Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
coldcock \coldcock\ v. t. to to knock to the ground with force.
Syn: deck, dump, knock down, floor. [WordNet 1.5]
coldcock v : knock down with force; "He decked his opponent" [syn: {deck}, {dump}, {knock down}, {floor}]
